summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing shipping charges for services rendered to J Epstein & Co Inc. It includes various transactions, dates, and recipients, highlighting the shipping costs and handling fees associated with multiple packages sent from their New York office.

keyFacts: The invoice details shipping charges totaling $540.21 for services rendered to J Epstein & Co Inc.
Multiple packages were sent from J Epstein & Co Inc to various recipients including Ghislaine Maxwell and Peg Ugland.
The invoice includes a temporary fuel surcharge applied by FedEx due to market conditions.
The document lists specific dates for package pickups and deliveries, indicating active shipping operations during July 2000.
Several packages were sent to notable addresses, including Harvard University and properties associated with Peg Ugland.
